main event: A report detailing a possible UFO sighting involving a trailing aircraft in the sky over Hawaii on October 6, 1967.
interesting points: The report mentions a possible poor song from an aircraft,The sighting involved an object trailing behind an aircraft,The observed object appeared to have an incandescent tail visible for approximately one mile,The object was sighted at a 45-degree elevation and disappeared over the horizon to the southwest,The report was part of Project Blue Book.
witness description: data not provided in the report
